title: Is Mozilla trying hard to kill itself?
author: pabs3
aiHeadline: Mozilla's latest move: a masterclass in self-destruction, or just another chapter in their quest to become the poster child for corporate suicide?

title: Gemini 3 Flash: Frontier intelligence built for speed
author: meetpateltech
aiHeadline: Gemini 3 Flash: So fast, it might just outrun your patience, but hey, at least it's not as slow as your Wi-Fi connection.

title: AWS CEO says replacing junior devs with AI is 'one of the dumbest ideas'
author: birdculture
aiHeadline: AWS CEO: Replacing junior developers with AI? That's about as smart as replacing your brain with a paperclip. Just saying.

title: Tell HN: HN was down
author: uyzstvqs
aiHeadline: HN outage: When the internet's favorite platform goes dark, and no one knows why, but hey, at least you can finally enjoy some peace and quiet.

title: Coursera to combine with Udemy
author: throwaway019254
aiHeadline: Coursera and Udemy team up: Now your online learning experience will be twice as overwhelming, but hey, at least you'll have twice as many certificates to show off.
